mapper.insert: insert into relation_customer_followsell ( bec_code, bas_code, rar_asin, rcf_crawl, rcf_on_sell, rcf_priority, rcf_frequency, rcf_times, rcf_sync_time ) values ( #{customerCode}, #{siteCode}, #{asin}, #{crawl}, #{onSell}, #{priority}, #{frequency}, #{times}, #{syncTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM relation_customer_followsell WHERE rcr_crawl = 1 AND rcr_on_sell = 1 AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - rcr_finish_time > rcr_frequency * 3600 or rcr_finish_time IS NULL;
mapper.update: UPDATE relation_customer_followsell SET rcf_crawl = #{crawl}, rcf_on_sell = #{onSell}, rcf_priority = #{priority}, rcf_frequency = #{frequency}, rcf_times = #{times}, rcf_sync_time = #{syncTime} WHERE bec_code = #{customerCode} and bas_code = #{siteCode} and rar_asin = #{asin}
